## First-time Contributors

**If it is the first time that you contribute to the bot, follow these steps:**

Write a comment in this issue thread to let other possible contributors know that you are working on this bug. For eg : `Hey all, I would like to work on this issue.`, follow [Contributing to the bot üî•‚ú®](https://github.com/osdc/bots/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and feel free to ask anything related to this issue ‚úåÔ∏è
